title: Morning Digest: We're looking back on Harry Reid's long and storied career on the campaign trail

sentence: Wiles has also done work for gubernatorial candidates Tudor Dixon in Michigan and Lynda Blanchard in Alabama, two races where Trump has also not yet endorsed, though Dixon does not pay Wiles.
title: Trump endorsements slow and prompt a scramble by candidates, advisers
